metadata.title: CVE-2020-28636 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in the Nef polygon-parsing functionality of CGAL libcgal CGAL-5.1.1. An oob read vulnerability exists in Nef_S2/SNC_io_parser.h SNC_io_parser::read_sloop() slh->twin() An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-28636` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcgal-demo - 5.2-3
libcgal-ipelets - 5.2-3
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> possible regression introduced by fix, see GH issue 5514

criterions.comment: cgal package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2-3').
